actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to change the minimum disability rating a veteran must have in order to receive additional compensation for dependents from 50 per centum to 10 percent.

summary.text: Reduces from 50 percent to ten percent the minimum disability rating necessary for a veteran entitled to wartime disability compensation to receive additional compensation for dependents.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to change the minimum disability rating a veteran must have in order to receive additional compensation for dependents from 50 per centum to 10 percent.
